content.title: Gastric Artery Aneurysm
content.description: Rare visceral aneurysm affecting left or right gastric arteries.

clinical_features.presentation: May present with GI bleeding or intraperitoneal hemorrhage

treatment.approach: All symptomatic and most asymptomatic should be treated

content.clinical_pearl: High rupture mortality makes prompt treatment essential regardless of size
content.statement: Gastric Artery Aneurysm is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Mesenteric that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
